name: Rolling Hog Adventures
description:
Take Harry on an adventure as you explore challenging mazes to find your way out. On the way he must traverse many perilous obstacles to collect food for the long winter ahead and the fastest way for him to do so is to roll! He will roll his way from the gardens of suburbia all the way to the dense forests in order to get himself ready for hibernation.

This game was developed by a small group of students at the University of Bradford to help the Wildlife Aid Foundation deliver a fun way to play and learn. By playing this game you are taking one step closer to helping Wildlife Aid Foundation to save Harry. Donate to Wildlife Aid Foundation if you found the game enjoyable and we can help contribute to stopping urban extinction of these beautiful creatures. We need to SAVE HARRY.
